1.caption_en:
Two slightly curved, parallel arrows arranged one above the other; the top arrow points right and the bottom arrow points left. Both are solid, dark-gray strokes on a white background.

{
  "type": "graphic",
  "description": "Two slightly curved, approximately parallel arrows placed horizontally, one above the other.",
  "count": 2,
  "arrows": [
    {
      "position": "top",
      "direction": "right",
      "curve": "convex upward",
      "stroke_color": "dark gray",
      "stroke_width_px": 6,
      "line_style": "solid",
      "arrowhead": true
    },
    {
      "position": "bottom",
      "direction": "left",
      "curve": "convex upward",
      "stroke_color": "dark gray",
      "stroke_width_px": 6,
      "line_style": "solid",
      "arrowhead": true
    }
  ],
  "layout": {
    "orientation": "horizontal",
    "parallel": true,
    "spacing": "even"
  },
  "background": "white"
}

4.caption_en:
A concise definition slide describing a "Platform" as a business that creates positive impact by operating physical or virtual spaces that connect two or more groups to find, interact, exchange, and co-create, using network engagement, data intelligence, and infrastructure for long-term sustainability.  

{
  "artifact_type": "definition slide",
  "title": "Platform (n)",
  "definition": "A business that creates a positive impact for its users, society and our planet. It operates a physical or virtual place to help two or more different groups to find, interact, exchange & co-create with each other.",
  "actions": [
    "find",
    "interact",
    "exchange",
    "co-create"
  ],
  "strengths": [
    "network engagement (network effects)",
    "data intelligence",
    "infrastructure"
  ],
  "purpose": "long term sustainability & success",
  "author": "Matthias Walter",
  "visual_style": {
    "background": "light grey",
    "primary_text_color": "dark grey/black",
    "accent_color": "teal",
    "layout": "large heading, left-aligned paragraph, bulleted action list"
  }
}

5.caption_en:
A platform-centric ecosystem diagram showing Consumers, Producers, Partners, and Owner arranged around a central Platform, with bidirectional curved arrows connecting Consumers and Producers.

{
  "type": "diagram",
  "style": "platform_ecosystem",
  "detected_text": [
    "Consumers",
    "Producers",
    "Partners",
    "Owner",
    "Platform",
    "a —"
  ],
  "elements": [
    {
      "id": "consumers",
      "label": "Consumers",
      "color": "#e5736b",
      "position": "top-left",
      "icon": "two-person silhouette"
    },
    {
      "id": "producers",
      "label": "Producers",
      "color": "#b9d44a",
      "position": "top-right",
      "icon": "factory"
    },
    {
      "id": "partners",
      "label": "Partners",
      "color": "#f3b323",
      "position": "bottom-left",
      "icon": "chain link"
    },
    {
      "id": "owner",
      "label": "Owner",
      "color": "#4dc0c6",
      "position": "bottom-right",
      "icon": "single-person silhouette"
    },
    {
      "id": "platform_outer",
      "label": "Platform (outer ring)",
      "color": "#bdbdbd",
      "position": "center",
      "shape": "large ring"
    },
    {
      "id": "platform_inner",
      "label": "Platform",
      "color": "#3f3f3f",
      "position": "center",
      "shape": "circle"
    }
  ],
  "relationships": [
    {
      "from": "consumers",
      "to": "producers",
      "type": "bidirectional",
      "visual": "pair of curved arrows above diagram"
    }
  ],
  "notes": "Central platform shown as concentric circles with four stakeholder circles around it; Consumers and Producers are explicitly connected by bidirectional arrows."
}
